Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2017 03:45AM suzieQ52 wrote: I'm waiting for the results of my 4th biopsy. I believe I will hear tomorrow. I had a regular screening mammo May 10th and have been on quite the journey for this past month. I've had diagnostic mammos, several USs, 3D mammo. Then 3 biopsies, core needle, US guided. At the end of that, they did another mammo to make sure it and the USs images agreed. They didn't. There was a 4th place, still in the same breast. Had a stereotactic biopsy last Wednesday. Seems like I just kind of go from one procedure, wait, then on to another procedure, wait. But, that's just the way of things. ;)
Posts.Title: Anyone else expecting results next week? Mins_Mum Sweet_Pea

Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2017 02:26AM suzieQ52 wrote: I received the report this past Monday on the 4th biopsy I had last week. I have breast cancer. Invasive ductal carcinoma. I have an appointment with the surgeon and radiation person next Thursday, the 22nd. No recommendations are being made until I see the surgeon. I am doing ok. I am wondering about this -- I developed a hematoma after the last biopsy (stereotactic), and that's been painful. I am also having times of brief pain underneath my arm, and I'm wondering if could be a sign that there is involvement in the lymph nodes. The NP I've been seeing has reassured me that she doesn't feel any enlargement there.
Posts.Title: Anyone else expecting results next week? Mins_Mum Sweet_Pea
